entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Hopewell
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:45 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
